text: Kɨ akɨnafarir kam ia bagha an osira, egha arazir kuram gamizir gumazim gɨnɨghnɨgha an osirizir puvatɨ. Egha gumazir igharazir pazava a gamim, kɨ uaghan a gɨnɨghnɨghizir puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, ian arazir aghuim azenim gɨrɨghtɨ, ia Godɨn damazimɨn deragh fogh suam, ia bar na gifonge. Bizir kam bagha kɨ akɨnafarir kam osiri.
